channel.title: briefUpdatesMainNLbreakingNews
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesMainNLbreakingNews, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: New study makes concerning discovery after testing samples from nearly 200 homes: 'It's a global problem'

item.title: Judge bars Beto O'Rourke's PAC from funding Texas Democrats in redistricting standoff
item.description: Texas AG Ken Paxton accused Beto O'Rourke's Powered by People of deceptive fundraising. O'Rourke vowed to keep fighting and plans a Fort Worth rally.

item.title: Authorities identify officer killed in burst of gunfire near CDC HQ, Emory campus
item.description: A police officer was killed after authorities say an active shooter opened fire near the CDC headquarters and Emory University's Atlanta campus.

item.title: Former FBI, CIA Director William H. Webster dies at 101
item.description: William H. Webster, who served as the head of both the FBI and the CIA in a career spanning the late 1970s to the early 1990s, has died. He was 101.

item.title: WATCH: Active shooter reported on Emory University's Atlanta campus
item.description: Emory University reported an active shooter on its Atlanta, Georgia, campus on Friday.

item.description: President Donald Trump has set Friday as a deadline for Russia's Vladimir Putin to agree to a ceasefire with Ukraine or face secondary sanctions.
